sfBatchQuery: SELECT Id, StageName, CloseDate, Probability, ForecastCategoryName, Merchant_Intent__c, NextStep, SE_Next_Steps__c, eComm_Amount__c, Projected_Billed_Revenue__c, Payments_GPV__c, Total_Revenue__c, Competitor__c, Position_Against_Competitor__c, Proposed_Launch_Date_Plus__c FROM Opportunity WHERE Id IN ('0068V0000113rSIQAY', '006OG00000EZIy6YAH', '006OG00000GJ5IvYAL', '006OG00000CRabaYAD', '006OG00000HnVs8YAF', '006OG00000HtxKFYAZ', '0068V0000113peWQAQ', '006OG00000JUPVtYAP', '006OG00000FHHAHYA5', '006OG00000Fbj8nYAB', '006OG00000G28JdYAJ', '006OG00000FYX8zYAH', '006OG00000Dh2YXYAZ', '006OG00000KW83lYAD', '006OG00000JMQ91YAH', '006OG00000KOC4YYAX')
bqBatchCallCheckSQL:
-- BATCH CALL CHECK: One query for all 16 accounts
-- Returns new calls (if any) since each account's last known call date
WITH account_cutoffs AS (
  SELECT account_id, cutoff_date, opp_id
  FROM UNNEST([
    STRUCT('0018V00002epjJDQAY' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-21') AS cutoff_date, '0068V0000113rSIQAY' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002d0KLlQAM' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-28') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000EZIy6YAH' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002eqnGJQAY' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-19') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000GJ5IvYAL' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002epVEaQAM' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-20') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000CRabaYAD' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002sPF8RQAW' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-21') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000HnVs8YAF' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002epVGWQA2' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-11') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000HtxKFYAZ' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002lHO5KQAW' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-08') AS cutoff_date, '0068V0000113peWQAQ' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002czX5rQAE' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-20') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000JUPVtYAP' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002d0FO8QAM' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-11') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000FHHAHYA5' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002igC8fQAE' AS account_id, DATE('2025-11-05') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000Fbj8nYAB' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002a7BPLQA2' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-13') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000G28JdYAJ' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002epVCgQAM' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-30') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000FYX8zYAH' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('001OG000010jdb5YAA' AS account_id, DATE('2026-01-07') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000Dh2YXYAZ' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002epV9yQAE' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-06') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000KW83lYAD' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('0018V00002czmgWQAQ' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-13') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000JMQ91YAH' AS opp_id),
    STRUCT('001OG00000kHK7sYAG' AS account_id, DATE('2026-02-18') AS cutoff_date, '006OG00000KOC4YYAX' AS opp_id)
  ])
)
SELECT
  ac.opp_id,
  ac.account_id,
  sc.event_id,
  sc.call_title,
  sc.event_start,
  sc.platform,
  sc.call_duration_minutes,
  sc.has_transcript,
  ARRAY_LENGTH(sc.transcript_details) AS transcript_segments,
  sc.transcript_summary,
  sc.attendee_details
FROM account_cutoffs ac
JOIN `shopify-dw.sales.sales_calls` sc
  ON ac.account_id IN UNNEST(sc.salesforce_account_ids)
  AND DATE(sc.event_start) > ac.cutoff_date
  AND DATE(sc.event_start) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 730 DAY)
ORDER BY ac.opp_id, sc.event_start DESC
